entry.data:
MOSTLY CLOUDY
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE MID 40S
WEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

PARTLY SUNNY IN THE MORNING, THEN MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF RAIN IN THE AFTERNOON

SOUTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH, BECOMING SOUTHEAST WITH GUSTS UP TO 25 MPH IN THE AFTERNOON
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

RAIN LIKELY, MAINLY IN THE EVENING
LOWS IN THE LOWER 40S

CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

CLOUDY WITH A 40 PERCENT CHANCE OF RAIN
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE MID 40S
NORTHWEST WINDS 15 TO 20 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 35 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 20S
NORTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH

PARTLY SUNNY IN THE MORNING, THEN CLEARING
